docs.snippet: The jury for this year’s Pritzker Prize sent a clear message by recognizing Shigeru Ban and his socially conscious architecture: Good design and good works can both be rewarded....
docs.lead_paragraph: The jury for this year’s Pritzker Prize sent a clear message by recognizing Shigeru Ban and his socially conscious architecture: Good design and good works can both be rewarded.
docs.abstract: Michael Kimmelman welcomes jury's decision to award Pritzker Prize to socially conscious architect Shigeru Ban, saying it sends clear message that good design and good works can both be rewarded; notes that choice is happy departure for a prize long criticized for favoring star architects and glamorous megaprojects.

headline.seo: Shigeru Ban, an Architect of Social Change
headline.main: With Paper Tubes, Building Social Change

docs.snippet: Estimates about the number of people who may have been in the vicinity when a huge mudslide smashed through the community of Oso continued to grow....
docs.lead_paragraph: Estimates about the number of people who may have been in the vicinity when a huge mudslide smashed through the community of Oso continued to grow.
docs.abstract: Estimates about number of people who may have been in vicinity when huge mudslide smashed through Washington community of Oso continues to grow; county officials say they have compiled 176 reports of people unaccounted for since disaster, which killed at least 14 people and wounded at least eight more.

headline.main: Search List Expands in Washington State Mudslide
headline.print_headline: Sense of an Expanding Disaster as a Mudslide’s Death Toll Grows
